text: Lexis may refer to: *Lexis (linguistics), the total bank of words and phrases of a particular language, the artifact of which is known as a lexicon *Lexis (Aristotle), a complete group of words in a language *LexisNexis, part of the LexisNexis online information database *Lexis diagram a demographic visualisation for showing age and period of cohort members on the same figure ==People with the name== *Wilhelm Lexis (1837–1914), German statistician, economist, and social scientist == See also == * Lexus, an automobile brand * Lexi, a Germanic given name
title: Lexis
